solution_line_template: In 1 session he jumps {jumps_per_minute} times/minute * {minutes_per_session} minutes = <<{jumps_per_minute}*{minutes_per_session}={jumps_per_session}>>{jumps_per_session} times
In {num_days} days he does {sessions_per_day} sessions/day * {num_days} days = <<{sessions_per_day}*{num_days}={total_sessions}>>{total_sessions} sessions
He jumps {total_sessions} sessions * {jumps_per_session} times/session = <<{total_sessions}*{jumps_per_session}={total_jumps_in_5_days}>>{total_jumps_in_5_days} times in {num_days} days.
